entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening then changing to snow at times heavy near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
